settings.personalComplianceInfo: These rules are checked for ALL your profiles. For company-specific rules, go to Enterprise Settings.

settings.pdfReportDescription: Includes risk assessment, compliance analysis, cultural sensitivity insights, and LLM-powered content analysis

enterprise.creator: Creator
enterprise.createCompanyDesc: Create a company to unlock team features, shared knowledge bases, and collaborative content workflows.
enterprise.becomeAdmin: You'll become the Company Admin with full control.
enterprise.onlyAdminsCanManage: Only Company Admins can manage the company knowledge base and team settings. Contact your admin for changes.
enterprise.createAsAdminNote: As the creator, you'll be the Company Admin with full permissions to manage the team and knowledge base.
enterprise.knowledgeBaseDesc: Documents uploaded here apply to all team members across all their content. These rules have the highest priority and override individual user and profile settings.
enterprise.uploadCompanyDocsHint: Brand guidelines, legal policies, compliance documents, social media policies
enterprise.noCompanyDocs: No company documents uploaded yet. Start by uploading your brand guidelines or compliance documents.
enterprise.teamMembersDesc: Manage your team members and their roles. Admins can upload company documents and manage the team.

documentation.title: Help & Documentation
documentation.subtitle: Find guides and resources to help you get the most out of Contentry. Choose a guide based on your role.

whatsNew.title: What's New
whatsNew.description: Automatically detected updates and new features added to the platform
whatsNew.subtitle: Automatically detected changes and updates to the platform

adminGuide.title: Admin Guide
adminGuide.description: Complete guide for platform administrators. Learn how to manage users, monitor analytics, and configure system settings.

enterpriseGuide.title: Enterprise Guide
enterpriseGuide.description: Guide for company administrators. Learn to manage your team, set up knowledge bases, and handle content approvals.

userGuide.title: User Guide
userGuide.description: Everything you need to create, analyze, and publish content. Perfect for content creators and marketers.

overview.intro: As a platform administrator, you have access to comprehensive tools for monitoring and managing the entire Contentry platform. This guide will help you understand your administrative capabilities.
overview.dashboardDesc: The Admin Dashboard provides a bird's-eye view of platform activity and health.
overview.feature4: Quick access to critical administrative functions
overview.tip: Visit the Admin Dashboard regularly to stay informed about platform trends and identify potential issues early.

userManagement.intro: User management is a core administrative function that allows you to oversee all users and enterprises on the platform.
userManagement.viewUsersDesc: Access the User Management section to view, search, and manage all platform users.
userManagement.feature1: Search and filter users by name, email, or role
userManagement.feature2: View detailed user profiles and activity history
userManagement.feature4: Deactivate or delete user accounts when necessary
userManagement.rolesDesc: Contentry has three primary user roles:
userManagement.role1: Admin: Full platform access with system configuration capabilities
userManagement.role2: Enterprise Admin: Manages their company's team and settings
userManagement.role3: User: Standard content creation and analysis features
userManagement.warning: Always verify the impact before changing user roles or deleting accounts. These actions may affect team workflows.

analytics.intro: Analytics provide deep insights into how the platform is being used across all enterprises and users.
analytics.metric1: Total active users and growth trends
analytics.metric5: Compliance and risk scores across enterprises
analytics.tip: Export analytics reports for stakeholder presentations using the Download Report feature.

financials.intro: The Financial Overview section provides visibility into platform revenue and subscription metrics.
financials.revenueDesc: Monitor financial health and subscription trends across all enterprises.

systemConfig.intro: System configuration allows you to manage platform-wide settings and integrations.
systemConfig.integration1: Ayrshare API for social media publishing
systemConfig.integration2: AI services for content generation and analysis
systemConfig.tip: Always test integrations in a staging environment before making changes to production settings.

gettingStarted.intro: Welcome to Contentry! As an Enterprise Administrator, you have the tools to manage your team, establish content guidelines, and ensure brand consistency.
gettingStarted.setupDesc: Follow these steps to set up your enterprise account:
gettingStarted.step1: Navigate to Settings > Enterprise to access your company dashboard
gettingStarted.step2: Upload your company's brand guidelines and policies to the Knowledge Base
gettingStarted.step3: Invite your team members and assign appropriate roles
gettingStarted.step4: Configure approval workflows for content review
gettingStarted.tip: Complete your Knowledge Base setup before inviting team members to ensure they have access to brand guidelines from day one.

teamManagement.intro: Effective team management ensures smooth collaboration and proper access control within your organization.
teamManagement.inviteDesc: Add new members to your enterprise team:
teamManagement.feature1: Enter the team member's email address
teamManagement.feature2: Select their role (Creator, Manager, or Admin)
teamManagement.feature3: Add an optional personal message to the invitation
teamManagement.role1: Creator: Can create and submit content for approval
teamManagement.role2: Manager: Can approve/reject content and manage creators
teamManagement.role3: Admin: Full enterprise access including billing and settings
teamManagement.tip: Invitations expire after 7 days. Remind team members to accept their invitations promptly.

knowledgeBase.intro: The Knowledge Base is your company's central repository for brand guidelines, policies, and content rules. Documents uploaded here inform AI-generated content for all team members.
knowledgeBase.uploadDesc: Add documents that will guide content creation:
knowledgeBase.docType1: Brand style guides and voice guidelines
knowledgeBase.tip: Upload your most important brand guidelines first. The AI prioritizes documents in the company Knowledge Base over individual user uploads.

approvalWorkflow.intro: The approval workflow ensures all content meets your company's standards before publishing.
approvalWorkflow.step2: Content is submitted for approval (if required)
approvalWorkflow.step4: Approved content can be published to social platforms
approvalWorkflow.warning: Enable approval requirements in Settings to ensure all content is reviewed before publishing.

billing.intro: Manage your enterprise subscription and monitor credit usage.
billing.feature1: Current plan details and credit allocation

adminUsersPage.title: User Management
adminUsersPage.subtitle: Manage platform-wide users
adminUsersPage.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this user?

deleteModal.title: Delete User
deleteModal.description: This will permanently delete the user and all associated data:

gettingStarted.intro: Welcome to Contentry! This guide will help you create compelling, compliant content using AI-powered tools.
gettingStarted.step1: Set up your profile with accurate information
gettingStarted.step3: Create a Strategic Profile for your brand or campaign
gettingStarted.step4: Generate your first piece of content
gettingStarted.tip: Start with a Strategic Profile to ensure all your content maintains consistent tone and messaging.

contentCreation.intro: Contentry's AI-powered content generation helps you create engaging posts in seconds.
contentCreation.feature1: Enter a topic or prompt describing what you want to post about
contentCreation.feature2: Select your target platforms (LinkedIn, Twitter, Facebook, etc.)
contentCreation.schedule1: Set up recurring content generation schedules
contentCreation.schedule2: Choose specific days and times for automatic posting
contentCreation.schedule3: Enable auto-posting or manual review before publishing
contentCreation.tip: Use the 'Promotional Content' checkbox when creating marketing posts to ensure compliance analysis considers promotional guidelines.

analyzeContent.intro: The Analyze Content feature reviews your content for compliance, cultural sensitivity, and brand alignment.
analyzeContent.step1: Navigate to Content Moderation > Analyze Content
analyzeContent.step2: Paste your content into the text area
analyzeContent.step3: Select a Strategic Profile for context
analyzeContent.step4: Click Analyze to receive detailed feedback
analyzeContent.type1: Compliance with company policies and guidelines
analyzeContent.tip: Always analyze content before publishing to external platforms, especially for campaigns targeting multiple regions.

strategicProfiles.intro: Strategic Profiles define the context, tone, and guidelines for content creation and analysis.
strategicProfiles.feature1: Define the profile's target audience and purpose
strategicProfiles.feature4: Configure default tone and style preferences
strategicProfiles.tip: Create separate Strategic Profiles for different campaigns, brands, or regional markets.

socialAccounts.intro: Connect your social media accounts to publish content directly from Contentry.
socialAccounts.warning: Keep your social account connections up to date. Expired tokens may prevent scheduled posts from publishing.

approvalProcess.intro: If your enterprise has approval workflows enabled, content must be reviewed before publishing.
approvalProcess.step2: Click 'Submit for Approval' to send to your manager
approvalProcess.step3: Track approval status in Pending Approval queue
approvalProcess.tip: Add notes when submitting content to give reviewers context about your creative decisions.

aboutGuide.title: About & Best Practices
aboutGuide.description: Learn what Contentry is for and discover best practices to optimize your content creation, brand deals, and influencer profiles.

whatIsContentry.intro: Contentry is an AI-powered content intelligence platform designed to help content creators, marketers, and enterprises create, analyze, and publish compliant content at scale. Whether you're an individual influencer or part of a large marketing team, Contentry streamlines your content workflow.
whatIsContentry.missionDesc: We believe in empowering creators with intelligent tools that ensure every piece of content is on-brand, culturally sensitive, and compliant with platform guidelines.
whatIsContentry.benefit1: AI-powered content generation that matches your brand voice
whatIsContentry.benefit2: Real-time compliance checking for regulatory requirements
whatIsContentry.benefit3: Cultural sensitivity analysis for global audiences
whatIsContentry.benefit4: Streamlined approval workflows for enterprise teams
whatIsContentry.tip: Contentry combines the power of AI with human oversight to deliver content that resonates with your audience while staying compliant.

keyFeatures.intro: Contentry provides a comprehensive suite of tools to manage your entire content lifecycle:
keyFeatures.aiContentDesc: Generate high-quality content tailored to your brand and audience:
keyFeatures.aiFeature1: Multi-platform content generation (LinkedIn, Twitter, Facebook, Instagram)
keyFeatures.aiFeature3: AI image generation to accompany your posts
keyFeatures.complianceDesc: Ensure your content meets all requirements before publishing:
keyFeatures.complianceFeature1: Automated compliance checking against company policies
keyFeatures.complianceFeature2: Cultural sensitivity scoring for international audiences
keyFeatures.tip: Use Strategic Profiles to ensure consistent brand voice across all generated content.

bestPractices.intro: Following these best practices will help you get the most out of Contentry and create content that performs well:
bestPractices.workflowDesc: A consistent workflow ensures quality and efficiency:
bestPractices.workflow1: Start by setting up your Strategic Profile with brand guidelines
bestPractices.workflow2: Generate content with specific platform and audience in mind
bestPractices.workflow3: Always analyze content before publishing to external platforms
bestPractices.workflow4: Use scheduling features to maintain consistent posting cadence
bestPractices.consistencyDesc: Consistent branding builds trust and recognition:
bestPractices.consistency1: Upload your brand style guide to the Knowledge Base
bestPractices.consistency2: Use the same Strategic Profile for related campaigns
bestPractices.consistency3: Review AI-generated content to ensure it matches your voice
bestPractices.warning: Always review AI-generated content before publishing. While our AI is powerful, human oversight ensures the best results.

optimizeContent.intro: Creating great content is just the beginning. Here's how to optimize for maximum engagement:
optimizeContent.platformDesc: Each platform has unique requirements and audience expectations:
optimizeContent.platform1: LinkedIn: Focus on professional insights, use industry keywords, longer form acceptable
optimizeContent.platform2: Twitter/X: Concise messaging, use hashtags strategically, engage with trending topics
optimizeContent.platform3: Facebook: Visual content performs well, encourage community engagement
optimizeContent.platform4: Instagram: High-quality visuals essential, use relevant hashtags, Stories for engagement
optimizeContent.engagement1: Post consistently at optimal times for your audience
optimizeContent.engagement2: Use compelling calls-to-action in your content
optimizeContent.engagement3: Respond to comments and engage with your community
optimizeContent.engagement4: Track analytics to understand what content performs best
optimizeContent.tip: Use Contentry's scheduling feature to post at optimal times without manual effort.

brandDeals.intro: Brand partnerships can be a significant revenue stream. Here's how to optimize your approach:
brandDeals.prep1: Maintain a professional, consistent content portfolio
brandDeals.prep2: Track and showcase your engagement metrics
brandDeals.prep3: Build a media kit with your demographics and reach
brandDeals.prep4: Use Contentry to generate sample branded content concepts
brandDeals.pitch1: Align your pitch with the brand's values and target audience
brandDeals.pitch2: Provide specific content ideas rather than generic proposals
brandDeals.pitch3: Include compliance analysis to show your content meets guidelines
brandDeals.tip: Use Contentry's compliance checking when creating sponsored content to ensure FTC and platform disclosure requirements are met.

influencerProfiles.intro: Your Strategic Profile is the foundation of your content strategy. Here's how to optimize it:
influencerProfiles.setupDesc: A well-configured profile ensures consistent, on-brand content:
influencerProfiles.setup1: Define your niche and target audience clearly
influencerProfiles.setup2: Set your preferred writing tone and style
influencerProfiles.setup3: Add cultural and regional considerations for your audience
influencerProfiles.setup4: Upload reference documents that define your brand voice
influencerProfiles.optimizeDesc: Continuously improve your profile for better results:
influencerProfiles.optimize1: Review generated content and adjust profile settings as needed
influencerProfiles.optimize2: Create multiple profiles for different campaigns or audiences
influencerProfiles.optimize3: Keep your Knowledge Base updated with latest brand guidelines
influencerProfiles.tip: Review your Strategic Profile quarterly to ensure it reflects your evolving brand and audience.

workflowsGuide.title: Workflows & Scoring Guide
workflowsGuide.description: Learn how the scoring system works and understand each workflow step from content analysis to approval.

scoring.intro: The scoring system in Contentry provides transparent, penalty-based scoring to help you understand how your content performs. All scores start at 100 and points are deducted for specific violations or issues found.
scoring.overallScoreDesc: The overall score is a weighted combination of all analysis factors, ranging from 0 to 100:
scoring.scoreRange1: 80-100: Excellent - Ready to publish, content is highly optimized
scoring.scoreRange2: 60-79: Good - Minor improvements recommended before publishing
scoring.scoreRange3: 40-59: Needs Attention - Review and revisions needed
scoring.scoreRange4: 0-39: Flagged - Significant issues, do not publish until resolved
scoring.overallCalcDesc: The overall score uses adaptive weighting based on risk level:
scoring.overallCalc4: Critical Risk (Compliance 40): Overall score hard-capped at 40 maximum
scoring.componentsDesc: Your overall score is calculated from three key components using a penalty-based system:
scoring.component1: Compliance Score: Starts at 100, deducts points per violation found
scoring.component2: Cultural Sensitivity Score: Average of Hofstede's 6 cultural dimensions
scoring.component3: Accuracy Score: Starts at 100, deducts points per inaccuracy or issue found
scoring.complianceDetailDesc: Every post starts with a Compliance Score of 100. Points are deducted for each violation:
scoring.complianceSeverity1: Critical Violation (-60 pts): NDA breach, confidential info disclosure  Immediate termination risk
scoring.complianceSeverity2: Severe Violation (-40 pts): Harassment, discrimination, hate speech  Legal action risk
scoring.complianceSeverity3: High Violation (-25 pts): Missing advertising disclosure, policy breach  Fines/suspension risk
scoring.complianceSeverity4: Moderate Violation (-10 pts): Inappropriate tone, minor guideline deviation  Training/warning
scoring.complianceSeverity5: Example: Missing #ad (-25) + Tone issue (-10) = Final score of 65
scoring.complianceAdjustment: Multiple violations stack - each penalty is applied cumulatively
scoring.complianceViolationTypes: Checked violations: Confidential info, Harassment, NDA breach, Missing disclosure, Policy breach, Inappropriate tone
scoring.culturalDetailDesc: Cultural score is the average of six official Hofstede cultural dimensions (0-100 each):
scoring.culturalDim1: Power Distance: Formality, respect for authority vs. egalitarian, casual tone
scoring.culturalDim2: Individualism vs. Collectivism: 'I/Me' focus vs. 'We/Us' community focus
scoring.culturalDim3: Masculinity vs. Femininity: Competitive/assertive vs. cooperative/consensus language
scoring.culturalDim4: Uncertainty Avoidance: Rules, safety, clarity emphasis vs. openness to ambiguity
scoring.culturalDim5: Long-Term Orientation: Future rewards focus vs. short-term gains
scoring.culturalDim6: Indulgence vs. Restraint: Optimistic/enjoyment vs. reserved/controlled language
scoring.culturalRisk: When Cultural Score drops below 50, 'Reputation Risk' weighting is applied to protect your brand across global audiences
scoring.accuracyDetailDesc: Every post starts with an Accuracy Score of 100. Points are deducted for issues found:
scoring.accuracyCheck1: Major Inaccuracy/Misinformation (-40 pts): False claims, fabricated data
scoring.accuracyCheck2: Non-Credible Source (-20 pts): Claims from unreliable sources
scoring.accuracyCheck3: Unverifiable Claim (-10 pts): Statements that cannot be fact-checked
scoring.accuracyCheck4: Example: False claim (-40) + Unverified source (-20) = Final score of 40
scoring.accuracyCalc: Multiple issues stack - each penalty is applied cumulatively
scoring.flagStatusDesc: Content is automatically flagged based on analysis results:
scoring.flag1: Good Coverage (Green): Scores above 80 - ready to publish
scoring.flag2: Needs Attention (Yellow): Scores 60-79 - minor improvements recommended
scoring.flag3: Flagged for Review (Orange): Scores 40-59 - review required before publishing
scoring.flag4: Critical Issues (Red): Scores below 40 - do not publish until resolved
scoring.disclosureDesc: For promotional content, the system also checks:
scoring.disclosure1: Is Promotional: Detects if content is advertising or sponsored
scoring.disclosure2: Has Disclosure: Checks for proper #ad, #sponsored, or partnership disclosure
scoring.disclosure3: Regional Compliance: Verifies FTC (US), EU, and Norway disclosure requirements
scoring.disclosure4: Missing disclosure triggers a High Violation (-25 points) on Compliance Score
scoring.tip: Scores are recalculated each time content is analyzed. Use the Rewrite feature to automatically improve low-scoring content while maintaining your message.

analyze.intro: The Analyze Content workflow helps you evaluate existing content for compliance, cultural sensitivity, and quality before publishing.
analyze.stepsDesc: Follow these steps to analyze your content:
analyze.step1: Navigate to Content Intelligence > Analyze Content tab
analyze.step2: Paste or type your content in the text area
analyze.step3: Select a Strategic Profile to apply your brand guidelines
analyze.step4: Optionally check 'Generate accompanying image' if you want AI to create a visual
analyze.step5: Click 'Analyze' to run the full analysis
analyze.type1: Compliance Check: Verifies content against platform policies and regulations (FTC, GDPR)
analyze.type2: Cultural Sensitivity: Scans for potentially offensive or culturally insensitive content
analyze.type3: Accuracy Verification: Checks claims and facts for accuracy
analyze.type4: Brand Alignment: Compares content against your Strategic Profile guidelines
analyze.tip: Use the 'Rewrite' button to automatically improve content that scores below 70. The AI will address flagged issues while maintaining your message.

generate.intro: The Generate Content workflow uses AI to create new content based on your topic, platform requirements, and brand guidelines.
generate.step1: Navigate to Content Intelligence > Content Generation tab
generate.step2: Enter your topic or describe what you want to create
generate.step3: Select your target platform(s) and writing tone
generate.step4: Choose a Strategic Profile for brand consistency
generate.optionsDesc: Customize your generated content with these options:
generate.option1: Platform Selection: Choose one or multiple platforms (LinkedIn, Twitter, Facebook, Instagram)
generate.option2: Writing Tone: Select from Professional, Casual, Inspirational, or Informative
generate.option3: Content Length: Adjust the target length for your content
generate.option4: Image Generation: Toggle on to create an accompanying AI-generated image
generate.tip: Generated content is automatically analyzed after creation. Review the scores and use the feedback buttons to regenerate if needed.

schedulePrompt.intro: Schedule Prompt allows you to set up automated content generation that runs at specified times, keeping your content calendar full without manual intervention.
schedulePrompt.howToDesc: Create prompts that automatically generate content:
schedulePrompt.step1: Create your content generation prompt with topic and preferences
schedulePrompt.step2: Set the schedule frequency (daily, weekly, or specific days)
schedulePrompt.step3: Choose the time when content should be generated
schedulePrompt.step4: Enable 'Auto-analyze' to run analysis on generated content automatically
schedulePrompt.benefit1: Maintain consistent posting without daily manual work
schedulePrompt.benefit2: Generate content during optimal creative hours
schedulePrompt.benefit3: Build a content backlog for review and approval
schedulePrompt.tip: Scheduled prompts generate content to your drafts. Review and approve before publishing to ensure quality.

schedulePost.intro: Schedule Post allows you to queue approved content for automatic publishing at optimal times across your connected social media platforms.
schedulePost.step1: From any content view, click 'Schedule' instead of 'Publish Now'
schedulePost.step2: Select your target date and time for publishing
schedulePost.step3: Choose which connected social platforms to publish to
schedulePost.step4: Confirm and add to your scheduled queue
schedulePost.option1: Specific Time: Choose an exact date and time for publishing
schedulePost.option2: Best Time: Let AI suggest optimal posting times based on engagement data
schedulePost.option3: Multi-Platform: Schedule the same content across multiple platforms at once
schedulePost.warning: Scheduled posts require at least one connected social media account. Connect accounts in Settings > Social Profiles.

approval.intro: The Approval Workflow ensures content quality by requiring manager review before publishing. This is especially important for enterprise teams and regulated industries.
approval.processDesc: How content moves through the approval workflow:
approval.step1: Creator submits content by clicking 'Submit for Approval'
approval.step2: Content appears in the manager's Approval Queue
approval.step3: Manager reviews content, scores, and analysis results
approval.step4: Manager approves, requests changes, or rejects the content
approval.status1: Draft: Content is being worked on, not yet submitted
approval.status2: Pending Approval: Submitted and waiting for manager review
approval.status3: Approved: Ready to publish or schedule
approval.status4: Needs Revision: Manager requested changes - check feedback and resubmit
approval.tip: Add notes when submitting content to give reviewers context about your creative decisions. This speeds up the approval process.

confirmDelete.title: Confirm Delete
confirmDelete.userMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this user? This action cannot be undone.
confirmDelete.bulkMessage: Are you sure you want to delete {{count}} users? This action cannot be undone.

confirmCancelSubscription.title: Cancel Subscription
confirmCancelSubscription.message: Are you sure you want to cancel this user's subscription? They will lose access to premium features.

twoFactorAuth.title: Two-Factor Authentication
twoFactorAuth.description: Add an extra layer of security to your account
twoFactorAuth.setupInstructions: Scan this QR code with your authenticator app
twoFactorAuth.backupCodesDescription: Save these codes in a safe place. You can use them to access your account if you lose your authenticator.

platformSelector.aiWillOptimize: AI will optimize content for {{count}} platform
platformSelector.aiWillOptimizePlural: AI will optimize content for {{count}} platforms
